thread.title_full: Ayodhya case litigant Iqbal Ansari showers rose petals during PM Modi's roadshow | Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Ayodhya case litigant Iqbal Ansari showers rose petals during PM Modi's roadshow | Entertainment
text: Ayodhya case litigant Iqbal Ansari showers rose petals during PM Modi's roadshow He is our guest and our Prime Minister, said Iqbal after he showered rose petals on Modis cavalcade as it passed the Paanji Tola area during his roadshow in the temple town.His father Hashim Ansari, the oldest litigant in the land dispute case, died at the age of 95 in 2016, after which Iqbal started pursuing the case in court.I showered rose petals on Modi jee when his cavalcade from in front of my house. [PTI](https://www.devdiscourse.com/pti-stories)| Ayodhya | Updated: 30-12-2023 17:52 IST | Created: 30-12-2023 17:52 IST - Country: - India As residents of Ayodhya lined the streets to welcome Prime Minister Narendra Modi on a chilly Saturday morning, among them was Iqbal Ansari, a litigant in Ram Janmabhoomi-Babri Masjid land suit. ''He (Modi) has come to our place. He is our guest and our Prime Minister,'' said Iqbal after he showered rose petals on Modi's cavalcade as it passed the Paanji Tola area during his roadshow in the temple town. His father Hashim Ansari, the oldest litigant in the land dispute case, died at the age of 95 in 2016, after which Iqbal started pursuing the case in court. ''I showered rose petals on Modi jee when his cavalcade from in front of my house. My family members were also present,'' Iqbal Ansari told PTI. On November 9, 2019, the Supreme Court backed the construction of a Ram temple by a government trust at the disputed site in Ayodhya and ruled that an alternative five-acre plot must be found for a mosque in the Hindu holy town. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.)
